Question
========

Given is the following table of averages for factor A with two levels (A1 and A2) and B also with two levels (B1 and B2):

  ---- ---- ---- A1 A2 B1 12 24 B2 14 13 ---- ---- ----

According to these data, what is the value of the main effect of factor A?

Answerlist
----------

* 1
* 11
* 12

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1: Incorrect
* 11: Correct
* 12: Incorrect
